parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the connection to retrieve.

nested_items.name: ConnectionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the connection retrieved.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the connection retrieved.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description for the connection retrieved.

nested_items.name: InvocationConnectivityParameters
nested_items.description: For connections to private APIs The parameters EventBridge uses to invoke the resource endpoint.

nested_items.name: ResourceParameters
nested_items.description: The parameters for EventBridge to use when invoking the resource endpoint.

nested_items.name: ResourceConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource configuration for the private API.

nested_items.name: ResourceAssociationArn
nested_items.description: For connections to private APIs, the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource association EventBridge created between the connection and the private API's resource configuration.

nested_items.name: ConnectionState
nested_items.description: The state of the connection retrieved.

nested_items.name: StateReason
nested_items.description: The reason that the connection is in the current connection state.

nested_items.name: AuthorizationType
nested_items.description: The type of authorization specified for the connection.

nested_items.name: SecretArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the secret created from the authorization parameters specified for the connection.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the KMS customer managed key for EventBridge to use to encrypt the connection, if one has been specified.

nested_items.name: AuthParameters
nested_items.description: The parameters to use for authorization for the connection.

nested_items.name: BasicAuthParameters
nested_items.description: The authorization parameters for Basic authorization.

nested_items.name: Username
nested_items.description: The user name to use for Basic authorization.

nested_items.name: OAuthParameters
nested_items.description: The OAuth parameters to use for authorization.

nested_items.name: ClientParameters
nested_items.description: Details about the client parameters returned when OAuth is specified as the authorization type.

nested_items.name: ClientID
nested_items.description: The client ID associated with the response to the connection request.

nested_items.name: AuthorizationEndpoint
nested_items.description: The URL to the HTTP endpoint that authorized the request.

nested_items.name: HttpMethod
nested_items.description: The method used to connect to the HTTP endpoint.

nested_items.name: OAuthHttpParameters
nested_items.description: The additional HTTP parameters used for the OAuth authorization request.

nested_items.name: HeaderParameters
nested_items.description: Any additional header parameters for the connection.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key for the parameter.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value associated with the key.

nested_items.name: IsValueSecret
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the value is a secret.

nested_items.name: QueryStringParameters
nested_items.description: Any additional query string parameters for the connection.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key for a query string parameter.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value associated with the key for the query string parameter.

nested_items.name: IsValueSecret
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the value is secret.

nested_items.name: BodyParameters
nested_items.description: Any additional body string parameters for the connection.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key for the parameter.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value associated with the key.

nested_items.name: IsValueSecret
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the value is secret.

nested_items.name: ApiKeyAuthParameters
nested_items.description: The API Key parameters to use for authorization.

nested_items.name: ApiKeyName
nested_items.description: The name of the header to use for the APIKeyValue used for authorization.

nested_items.name: InvocationHttpParameters
nested_items.description: Additional parameters for the connection that are passed through with every invocation to the HTTP endpoint.

nested_items.name: HeaderParameters
nested_items.description: Any additional header parameters for the connection.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key for the parameter.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value associated with the key.

nested_items.name: IsValueSecret
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the value is a secret.

nested_items.name: QueryStringParameters
nested_items.description: Any additional query string parameters for the connection.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key for a query string parameter.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value associated with the key for the query string parameter.

nested_items.name: IsValueSecret
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the value is secret.

nested_items.name: BodyParameters
nested_items.description: Any additional body string parameters for the connection.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key for the parameter.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value associated with the key.

nested_items.name: IsValueSecret
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the value is secret.

nested_items.name: ConnectivityParameters
nested_items.description: For private OAuth authentication endpoints. The parameters EventBridge uses to authenticate against the endpoint.

nested_items.name: ResourceParameters
nested_items.description: The parameters for EventBridge to use when invoking the resource endpoint.

nested_items.name: ResourceConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource configuration for the private API.

nested_items.name: ResourceAssociationArn
nested_items.description: For connections to private APIs, the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource association EventBridge created between the connection and the private API's resource configuration.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: A time stamp for the time that the connection was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: A time stamp for the time that the connection was last modified.

nested_items.name: LastAuthorizedTime
nested_items.description: A time stamp for the time that the connection was last authorized.
